sentences.en: Bertha would surely never have fallen in love with him if he were faultless.
sentences.cn: 要不是他无可指责的话,伯莎确实不会同他恋爱的.

sentences.en: He had always an easy temper , a faultless digestion, and a rosy cheek.
sentences.cn: 他一向无忧无虑, 消化不错, 面色红润.

sentences.en: He is lifeless that is faultless.
He made his action and appearance to be decent and faultless.
sentences.cn: 他已使自己的举止仪态变得高雅完美.

sentences.en: Her carriage and diction were always faultless.
sentences.cn: 她的风度举止、遣词用字总是无可挑剔.

sentences.en: Maria was indeed the pride and delight of them all - perfectly faultless - an angel.
sentences.cn: 玛丽亚确是他们家族的骄傲与欢乐,她白玉无瑕,她是个天使.

sentences.en: Sadly, you will no longer be seen as godlike and faultless.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是, 孩子将不再认为你是圣洁无瑕的.

sentences.en: The ballerina remained suspended in a faultless arabesque.
sentences.cn: 这位芭蕾舞女演员一直保持着完美的阿拉贝斯克舞姿不动。

sentences.en: The dancers gave an absolutely faultless performance.
sentences.cn: 舞蹈家们作了一次完美无瑕的表演.

sentences.en: The suit was faultless: Wood guessed that he was a very successful publisher or a banker.
sentences.cn: 西装无可挑剔：伍德推测他可能是个相当成功的出版商或银行家。

sentences.en: They found Essien and Carvalho faultless in central defence.
sentences.cn: 他们发现埃辛与卡瓦点在中路防守毫无犯错.

sentences.en: This child was faultless in form.
When I was eight years old, my parents were faultless gods.
sentences.cn: 八岁时, 我视父母为完美无缺的崇拜偶像.

words.tran_cn: 故障；[地质] 断层；错误；缺点；毛病；（网球等）发球失误
（通常用于疑问句或否定句）挑剔
